I won't lose!\""},{"lineNumber":113880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、なんとなくレベルアップ気分！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I somehow feel like I'm leveling up!\""},{"lineNumber":113881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へーっ、ここが有名なマルグリッド迷宮かー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh, so this is the famous Marguerite Labyrinth.\""},{"lineNumber":113882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当に急ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This really is sudden.\""},{"lineNumber":113883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だー、だから俺まで一緒なんじゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Dah, that's why I have to come along too!\""},{"lineNumber":113884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「帰る！　俺は帰るぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm going home! I'm going home!\""},{"lineNumber":113885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ランスさん、モンスターの大群が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Rance-san, a huge group of monsters!\""},{"lineNumber":113886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーっ、どけー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah! Get out of the way!\""},{"lineNumber":113887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やったー、鬼百人斬りも達成だー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay! I've also achieved killing a hundred demons!\""},{"lineNumber":113888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つ、疲れた……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-tired...?"},{"lineNumber":113889,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前、いつもこんなことしてるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you always do things like this?\""},{"lineNumber":113890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haah..."},{"lineNumber":113891,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつもってわけじゃないけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not all the time, but"},{"lineNumber":113892,"originalJapaneseLine":"　修行は大体こんな感じです」","translatedEnglishLine":"training is usually like this.\""},{"lineNumber":113893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、ランス様、大丈夫ですか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Lord Rance, are you alright...?\""},{"lineNumber":113894,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、健太郎くん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, Kentarou-kun."},{"lineNumber":113895,"originalJapaneseLine":"　蜂蜜のレモン漬けだー、元気出してね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, honey-lemon preserves—cheer up.\""},{"lineNumber":113896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、元気百倍！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, feeling a hundred times better!"},{"lineNumber":113897,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ＨＰも全回復だー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"My HP is fully restored!\""},{"lineNumber":113898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がんばれー、がんばー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do your best, do your best—\""},{"lineNumber":113899,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬぐぐぐぐ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ughuhuhuh...\""},{"lineNumber":113900,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィーーーール！","translatedEnglishLine":"Sealeee!\""},{"lineNumber":113901,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺にも元気の出るものー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Give me something that gives energy too!\""},{"lineNumber":113902,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、すみません、世色癌くらいしか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah, sorry, I only have some seisyokugan...\""},{"lineNumber":113903,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ガツガツ！　バクバク！」","translatedEnglishLine":"*Munch munch! Gobble gobble!*"},{"lineNumber":113904,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さー、ランスさんガンガン行きましょうー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, Rance-san, let's go all out!\""},{"lineNumber":113905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がー！　お前が先導すんなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah! Don't lead the way!\""},{"lineNumber":113906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、いいのかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, is that okay...?\""},{"lineNumber":113907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「健太郎くん、がんばれー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentarou-kun, do your best!\""},{"lineNumber":113908,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は迷宮に閉じ込められていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others were trapped inside the labyrinth."},{"lineNumber":113909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛し合う男女が恋人らしいことを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The labyrinth where loving couples have to act like lovers"},{"lineNumber":113910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　せんと出られない迷宮か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"before they can escape...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かいるのか？　シィルかぁ〜？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is someone there? Is that you, Seale~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どわあああ！？
なななな、なんでお前がここに！？」
「……寝ぼすけが」
「美樹ちゃんの為にも頑張るぞー、えいえいおー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll do my best for Miki-chan too, hey hey oh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、僕、
美樹ちゃんを守れるように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: want to become stronger to protect Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと強くなりたいんです」
「何が、というわけなのかサッパリだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have no idea what 'so' means, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあいい心がけだ、強くなれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: well, it's a good mindset. Get stronger."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ま、その美樹ちゃんは俺様がいずれ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Well, that Miki-chan will be mine sooner or later...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐふふ……）
「はい、というわけで修行に行ってきます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, so I'm going off to train!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで翔竜山です！」
「相変わらず話が急ですね」
「って、なんで俺もじゃー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, why do I have to come too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ランスさん、ドラゴンが来ましたよ！」
「うおおーーー！　負けるかーーー！」
「うーん、なんとなくレベルアップ気分！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, I somehow feel like I'm leveling up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へーっ、ここが有名なマルグリッド迷宮かー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, so this is the famous Marguerite Labyrinth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に急ですね」
「だー、だから俺まで一緒なんじゃー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Dah, that's why I have to come along too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「帰る！　俺は帰るぞー！」
「あっ、ランスさん、モンスターの大群が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Rance-san, a huge group of monsters!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーっ、どけー！」
「やったー、鬼百人斬りも達成だー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yay! I've also achieved killing a hundred demons!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つ、疲れた……
お前、いつもこんなことしてるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you always do things like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……
いつもってわけじゃないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not all the time, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 修行は大体こんな感じです」
「ああ、ランス様、大丈夫ですか……？」
「はい、健太郎くん。
蜂蜜のレモン漬けだー、元気出してね」
「うーん、元気百倍！
ＨＰも全回復だー！」
「がんばれー、がんばー」
「ぬぐぐぐぐ……
シィーーーール！
俺にも元気の出るものー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Give me something that gives energy too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ、すみません、世色癌くらいしか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah, sorry, I only have some seisyokugan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガツガツ！　バクバク！」
「さー、ランスさんガンガン行きましょうー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, Rance-san, let's go all out!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がー！　お前が先導すんなー！」
「ああ、いいのかな……」
「健太郎くん、がんばれー」
ランス達は迷宮に閉じ込められていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others were trapped inside the labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「愛し合う男女が恋人らしいことを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The labyrinth where loving couples have to act like lovers

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せんと出られない迷宮か……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
